text:
@dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn those 2,000 deaths daily 

=

The common yearly pneumonia and flu of older people... labeled now COVID19

Keep the numbers up to push fear in Americans to get mail in voting and keep Biden out of the spotlight....
